entry.title: FOG ADVISORY ENDED, Maple Creek
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 09:53 AM CST Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 3.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Maple Creek 10:00 AM CST Saturday 18 March 2023
Temperature: 3.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.3 kPa falling
Humidity: 30 %
Dewpoint: -12.9°C
Wind: SSW 27 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Sunny. High minus 6 except plus 4 near the Trans-Canada Highway.
entry.summary: Sunny. Fog patches dissipating this afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High minus 6 except plus 4 near the Trans-Canada Highway. Wind chill near minus 14. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Saturday 18 March 2023
